New Records: The Pelicans have important decisions on roster construction that will heavily impact the team moving forward.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Orleans Pelicans are 5-28 on the season, marking the worst record in the NBA.
Others: The Pelicans are slightly below $1 million over the luxury cap, so the team will most assuredly make a move to duck the tax before the season ends.
Brandon Ingram is averaging 22.2 points, 5.6 rebounds, and 5.2 assists per game this season.
